RelatedSentence: With pressure mounting about the Veterans Affairs scandal , White House Chief of Staff Denis McDonough said Sunday that President Barack Obama was madder than hell over allegations of inadequate medical care for veterans .
Although McDonough voiced confidence in embattled VA Secretary Eric K. Shinseki 's ability to resolve the matter , he stopped short of offering a full vote of confidence .
